descriptionHtml:
Sorry my bad english...
Just did a retexture for this mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7431
with some blue lines, to leave weapons of different steel


::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

   Install:
Just unzip the data folder C:Program Files\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\Data\
or use the NMM(recommended)

  Uninstall:
Just delete this folder
C:Program Files\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\Data\textures\weapons\steel


Thanks Jargu by this mod and thanks Bethesda for this fucking amazing game
author: Elvis SicSicSix
